Episodes.Title: Addition by Subtraction
Episodes.Plot: PJ and the guys look for a replacement for Andy, while reminiscing about how they all first met.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Gourmets and Confused
Episodes.Plot: PJ, Bobby, Kenny and Stephanie go out to a nice dinner like adults. Brendan and Mike, who are not invited, decide to dress up in suits and go out on their own.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Mike-Fest
Episodes.Plot: It's Mike's birthday and he wants a really fun surprise party. Instead, they all agree to a pub-crawl. Meanwhile, a movie producer is interested in Stephanie's book.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Be a Man!
Episodes.Plot: The gang discusses what it is to be a man these days. PJ has a list of things men should know how to do for Mike and Kenny. Meanwhile, Bobby has moved in and starts to fix things around the house.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: The NTO
Episodes.Plot: PJ fears the passion in her relationship with Bobby may have fizzled. Meanwhile, the guys are trying to keep secrets from one another.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Hanger Management
Episodes.Plot: Bobby is pondering a new career. Kenny discovers he's talented at closet designing and Brendan decides it may be finally time to move out of PJ's.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Puss 'N' Glutes
Episodes.Plot: PJ and Stephanie take on the challenge of finding solid, stable women with which to build a relationship for Mike and Brendan.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Extreme Mike-Over
Episodes.Plot: Crowley's is being taken over by obnoxious college grads and the gang decides they may need to find a new bar. Meanwhile, as things between Mike and Marcia progress, we learn that he's keeping something from her.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: My Men
Episodes.Plot: Mike wants to throw a birthday party for Marcia and recruits the gang to help him plan, but PJ is suddenly immersed by work. Meanwhile, Stephanie has a great career opportunity in London and Brendan has a very important decision to make.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
